link.description: Effective civic tech projects require thoughtful approaches to collaboration, leadership, and continuous improvement. Our Ways of Working, inspired by the systemic design framework, provide a holistic approach to creating impactful and sustainable civic solutions. These practices help teams navigate complex challenges, foster strong relationships, and drive meaningful change in our communities. â€“ These Ways of Working are interconnected and mutually reinforcing. By integrating these practices into your civic tech projects, you can create more resilient, effective, and transformative solutions that truly serve your community.
